name: eone-skills
description: Azure DevOps skills for pipeline monitoring, test analysis, work item management, and pull request lifecycle for eONE project
author: Glen Schrader

skills.name: ado-pipelines
skills.description: Interact with Azure DevOps pipelines and builds using the Azure CLI DevOps extension

skills.name: ado-work-items
skills.description: Manage Azure DevOps work items, create new work items, link them to branches, and create pull requests

skills.name: ado-pr
skills.description: Manage Azure DevOps pull requests including creating, reviewing, updating, merging PRs, and managing reviewers
